name: Industry Transporters

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/MK game production/Industry Transporters Alpha 64bit/Industry Transporters.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Groupees archive
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/MK game production/Industry Transporters Alpha 64bit/Industry
    Transporters.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /batch
    executable: $CACHE/ITA_64bitSetup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
